name: INListCarsIntentResponse
desc: Your app’s response to a request to list the user’s electric vehicles.

items.name: init(code: INListCarsIntentResponseCode, userActivity: NSUserActivity?)
items.desc: Creates a response object with the specified code and user activity.

items.name: var code: INListCarsIntentResponseCode
items.desc: The code that indicates success or failure when confirming or handling the intent.

items.name: enum INListCarsIntentResponseCode
items.desc: Constants that represent the status of a response.

items.name: var cars: [INCar]?
items.desc: An array of the user’s electric vehicles.

items.name: class INCar
items.desc: A specific electric vehicle that Maps uses during route planning and navigation.
